name: Just Sing
description:
Create your own music videos with Just Sing™! Sing or lip sync to your favorite songs – from the hottest hits to all-time classics.
A smartphone is all you need to get the party started! Simply download the free Just Sing Companion App to your smartphone, sync it with your console and use your smartphone as your microphone and camera.
With Just Sing, easily create memorable videos with up to 3 friends by changing themes and filters as you perform. Save your video locally to keep track of the fun or share it with your friends!
• ENJOY A LARGE SONG CATALOG
Including hits from Sia, Maroon 5, Shawn Mendes, and many more!
• HAVE FUN SINGING OR LIP-SYNCING
Sing and get scored, or just lip-sync and put on a show. Up to 4 players.
• YOUR SMARTPHONE IS YOUR MIC AND CAMERA
With the free Just Sing Companion App. No console camera required.
• CREATE AND CUSTOMIZE YOUR OWN UNIQUE MUSIC VIDEOS
Choose from different themes, filters and effects.
• SHARE YOUR VIDEOS WITH YOUR FRIENDS
